name: How to Get Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) Certification
description: Attaining the Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) certification is much easier than being an effective Scrum Product Owner. The certification is important in that it demonstrates a foundational understanding of the role and a commitment to learning how to perform it.
